----
+++ General
Existing page links can be quickly inserted into the page, by using the Wikidpad autocompletion function.

+++ Wikiwords
Type the first 1 or more characters of the word and then press Ctrl+Space. A list of existing wikiwords will appear, from whitch you can choose the one you want. To cancel autocompletion, press Escape.

Screenshot:
rel://files/Autocomplete%20WikiWord.png

+++ Links
The same thing can be done for bracketed links. Type the opening bracket and the first chacters of the link and press Ctrl+Space. The resulting list however, shows both wikiwords ánd links. If user tags are used, also thóse will appear in the list, since they have the format of a link.

Screenshot:
rel://files/Autocomplete%20links.png
